name: vehicle-guesser-backend
description: AWS Lambda serverless backend for Vehicle Guesser

scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../lambda-function.zip . && cd .. && zip -r lambda-function.zip node_modules
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name vehicle-guesser-api-prod --zip-file fileb://lambda-function.zip --region eu-west-1

author: Vehicle Guesser Team
